mapper.select: SELECT tablespace_name "tablespaceName" , volumn "volumn" FROM user_tbspc_tb WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY 1

SELECT d.file_name "fileName" , sum(d.bytes/1024/1024) "total" , sum(f.bytes)/1024/1024 "free" , sum(d.bytes/1024/1024) - sum(f.bytes)/1024/1024 "used" FROM dba_data_files d, dba_free_space f WHERE d.file_id = f.file_id(+) AND d.tablespace_name = #{tablespaceName} GROUP BY d.file_name ORDER BY 1
SELECT user_id "userId" , pay_date "payDate" , pay_item "payItem" , pay_type "payType" , cancel_yn "cancelYn" FROM service_state_tb WHERE user_id = #{userId}
